_comment: Shared configuration for tactical map generator. Edit via web UI at http://localhost:8080

grid._hex_size_help: Size of each hex in meters (flat edge to flat edge)
grid._grid_help: Number of hexes wide and tall

contours._help: Regular contours every N meters, bold index contours every M meters

print._bleed_help: Bleed area for professional printing (typically 0.125 = 1/8 inch)
print._data_margin_help: Margin outside bleed for title, legend, scale bar

play_margins._help: Margins from trim edge to hex grid (allows space for title bars etc.)

mgrs._help: MGRS grid line interval in meters (1000 = 1km grid)
